imdb.title: Sasami mahô shôjo kurabu
imdb.plot: Under the guise of the Cooking Club, Sasami and her friends will learn to harness their magical abilities!

episodes.title: Natsu no owari ni
episodes.plot: Misao gets upset when Miss Washu bans the girls from ever returning to the World of the Witches. Little does Misao and her friends know, the World of Witches is about to come to them in a very dramatic way.

episodes.title: Saikai, soshite
episodes.plot: Sasami and the girls venture into the trap-filled Tower of Twilight to save Misao from a bad situation she might not even know she's in. But who will save the rescuers when Misao's minions attack?

episodes.title: Kokoro, yami ni somete
episodes.plot: The Chief Sorceress encourages Misao to reach into the darkest parts of her heart. She may not be sinister enough to pull it off - but a chance meeting with a familiar face may offer all the negativity Misao needs.

episodes.title: Yoru ga aketara
episodes.plot: The dark magic of the World of the Witches has changed Misao's appearance and attitude, forcing Sasami to rush straight into the lair of the enemy to save her friend!

episodes.title: Hohoemi ni saku hana
episodes.plot: The Chief Sorceress wants to claim the light of Sasami's power, but the girls know what best battles evil: the magic of friendship! If Misao and her friends find their misplaced trust, humanity might stand a chance!

episodes.title: Atataka na yume
episodes.plot: Just as things are returning to normal, Itoki brings news of brewing magical trouble. Ginji knows the only way to stop the threat will hurt those nearest to him the most!

episodes.title: Ami chan no koe
episodes.plot: The Magical Girls Club must depend on each other more than ever as their foes from the World of the Witches invade to make their final move! Sometimes, true friendship can save the world!

episodes.title: Sasami to misao
episodes.plot: The pursuit of a weird rabbit-thing leads Misao and Sasami to new friendship - and to their destiny! The Magical Girls Club is in session!

episodes.title: Hoshi ni negai wo...
episodes.plot: After Sasami and Misao learn about their mystical heritage, a new face arrives to join them in the Magical Girls Club. But little Makoto is about to learn the hard way to be careful what you wish for!

episodes.title: Hajimete no ichiban
episodes.plot: The school holds a marathon to celebrate popular Tsukasa's return to campus after a long absence. When she quickly vanishes from the roll again, Sasami go to Tsukasa's house to figure out why.

episodes.title: Kyôfu no an an techô
episodes.plot: Anything Anri writes in her magic notebook appears in real life! Unfortunately, all she's been writing lately are the colorful insults now hanging above the heads of Sasami and her friends!

episodes.title: Tonneru nuketara
episodes.plot: Sasami needs parental permission to take a field trip to the World of the Witches, but her father is reluctant to give it. Hopefully he'll have a change of heart before the train pulls out!

episodes.title: Hoshizora dansu
episodes.plot: The adventure continues in the World of the Witches! Sasami meets an odd boy named Amitav who seems to know who she is. And Misao's loneliness fades when she meets so many other girls who are just like her!

episodes.title: Yozora no tegami
episodes.plot: After a school assignment fills Sasami's mind with thoughts of Amitav, she and Misao decide to pay another visit to the World of the Witches. When they lose their way, a friend must come to the rescue!

episodes.title: Nakayoshi no yubiwa
episodes.plot: At the Niko-Niko Bazaar, Misao finds herself working with Chiaki and Kozue. It's a great chance to get to know Sasami's friends, but Misao simply can't help it as one thing after another goes wrong!

episodes.title: Sayonara washu sensei
episodes.plot: Miss Washu's job is on the line after Mr. Tonobe investigates the Cooking Club. Sasami and the girls step in to save her with a little culinary magic!

episodes.title: Mahô shôjo no deshi
episodes.plot: Asami wants nothing more than to be an apprentice of the Magical Girls Club. When Sasami and the others learn the reason why, they want nothing more than to help reunite Asami with her dead parents.

episodes.title: Minna issho
episodes.plot: Sasami and her pals are invited to take part in a Magical Girls Tournament! But their excitement soon gives way to exhaustion when Miss Washu's grueling practice sessions put their friendships to the test!

episodes.title: Mahô shôjo taikai zawa zawa hen
episodes.plot: Misao's torn between her loyalty to the club and her feelings for Monta, and her emotional turmoil could cause her friends to miss the Magical Girls Tournament!

episodes.title: Mahô shôjo taikai kira kira hen
episodes.plot: Sasami's team is behind, with one event left in the tournament! As they struggle to magically cover a tree's bare branches with blossoms of love and happiness, Sasami's father gives Miss Washu some startling news.
